column4: is there away to see wich directory an application create in the first execution in the home directory of a user ?
you could save an ls to a file before and after installation, then run diff against them
i just want to know what gnome-pilot from evolution have created in my home directory to delete them
try "locate gnome-pilot" and see if it stuck a directory with that in the name under your home
so, you don't have anything else about gpilot and gnome-pilot in your home dir ?
yes there is a file in each of those directories.
ok but you only have .gpilotd and gnome2/gnome-pilot.d ?
